DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy omalizumab 48 week adult patient moderate severe bronchial asthma . THIS STUDY IS NOT ENROLLING PATIENTS IN THE UNITED STATES
DOC.brief_title: Long-Term Study IGE025 Moderate Severe Bronchial Asthma .
